plot: A lonely man enters a Jazz club, lost in his own thoughts. Suddenly a woman shows up in his table and shakes him up for good.
title: Jazz
plot_es: A lonely man enters a Jazz club, lost in his own thoughts. Suddenly a woman shows up in his table and shakes him up for good.
plot_en: A lonely man enters a Jazz club, lost in his own thoughts. Suddenly a woman shows up in his table and shakes him up for good.
